ygData.subject: RE: lindel
ygData.msgSnippet: With how you have talked on here so far I dont think swaying words would be one of your strong points. All in favor of not holding our breath say Aye. ...
ygData.messageBody:
With how you have talked on here so far I dont think swaying words would be
one of your strong points.

All in favor of not holding our breath say Aye.


-----Original Message-----
From: Joshua Bednarz [mailto:thewhitemage@...]
Sent: Monday, October 04, 1999 4:01 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] lindel


From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>

I understand your feelings, but I don't think that we should. You see I
myself approaced him VERY cautiously, so if we had tons of people bothering
him,then he might close up completely, let me talk to him again, I was
planning on it anyway. Maybe I can use some swaying words to get him to
reaveal what he knows.
